item.title: Simple rules for CI
item.description: Don’t branch (or at least keep them short lived) The goal of Continuous Integration is to integrate often. Long lived branches work against this goal and should be avoided. As a rule of thumb you should strive to at least have you changes pushed to the remote master before the end of your work day. Have a fast test suite Have a lightning fast test suite, a couple of minutes at the most.
